thread.title: Customer James Giles
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by Customer James Giles

author: Customer James Giles
title: Customer James Giles
text: I would and have told my friends and anybody who asks me that I bring my vehicle to Mavis and no one else. I am always satisfied with the customer service, with your prices and the work performed on my vehicle. It is so satisfying and a relief to have a trustworthy mechanic to work on my truck. I have also found your prices to be more than fair. Thanks for taking such good care of me and my 2005 Rumble Bee. Sincerely, James Giles
